title: Rescue Wulbren
content:
Rescue Wulbren Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Shadow-Cursed Lands Reward Brilliant Retort

Rescue Wulbren is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Rescue Wulbren can be acquired during Act 2. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Rescue Wulbren Objectives

Go to Moonrise Towers. Find a way to get the gnomes out of jail. Give Wulfren something to break the stones. Cover the gnome
